backend/main.mo: Defines an actor that stores inquiries in a list and exposes methods to submit a new inquiry and retrieve all inquiries.
feature_evidence.json: Provides feature evidence metadata listing required contact info updates and affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing structure, styling, and component purposes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the main site layout including header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Describes the company and displays four value cards highlighting reliability, customer focus, excellence, and local focus.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Renders business contact information cards and a validated inquiry form that submits data to the backend.
Renders a coverage section showing delivery windows, service areas, nationwide pickup, and a list of primary coverage locations.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Displays the hero banner with a headline, description, call-to-action buttons, stats, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Shows a grid of service cards detailing logistics, courier, express parcel, and business shipping offerings.
Footer component showing brand info, navigation links, service list, and business contact details.
Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile sheet menu for section scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Defines a mutation hook that submits an inquiry via the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode settings, and layout utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/validation/contactInqui: Validates contact form fields for name, phone, email, and message, returning errors and validity status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers and applying global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color tokens, typography and animation extensions, and includes container queries and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, version, and implemented features for a logistics website, including navigation, services, contact form, and theme requirements.
